ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 569
ygData.msgSnippet: what server are you playing on? Sheri Kendall wrote:Just started a new mage on a different server than the one I usually play on (so I could play with my BF).
ygData.messageBody:
what server are you playing on?

 Sheri Kendall wrote:

Just started a new mage on a different server than the one I usually play on
(so I could play with my BF). Just wondering if anyone had any suggestions
for gear I can get her. I totally dont want to do the newbie gear quests if
I can help it. I'd rather go out and buy some inexpensive armor. Got a
decent robe for now, but at level 10 she's wearing nothing else but cloth
and the summoned focus items. Got any suggestions? (sniff... I'm so used to
twinking my alts I forgot what it's like to work for your stuff hehe)
